about_the_game: In this additional free scenario for "Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories", you are a master criminal who is looking to be hired by a prestigious criminal organization, and have managed to get to the job interview. Unfortunately, the interview turns out to be quite unconventional, and you must make good use of your wits and patience to leave a positive impression with your future employer.
